Class CustomCommentsRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.repository.CustomCommentsRepository

  • @Repository
public class CustomCommentsRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom actions have been defined for CustomCommentsRepository and encapsulates custom retrieval and search behavior with own queries.

      • getallcomments

        public java.util.List getallcomments(int cmtTypeid,
                            java.lang.String cmtType,
                            int pageno,
                            int pagesize)
        Returns list of comments object with their details.
        Parameters:
        cmtTypeid - This integer value holds activity type id.
        cmtType - It has a constant value "COMMENTS".
        pageno - Current page number.
        pagesize - Total number of records shown in current page.
        Returns:
        list of comments.

      • listCommentswithcmtlikecnt

        public java.util.List listCommentswithcmtlikecnt(int activityid,
                                        java.lang.String studiosActivity,
                                        int ptyid)
        Returns list of comments and it's like count with their details.
        Parameters:
        activityid - An unique activity id.
        studiosActivity - type of an activity.
        ptyid - An unique party id.
        Returns:
        List of comments and likes.

      • chkpartyDevicetoken

        Returns Map object with combination of party and device token.
        Parameters:
        cmtTypeId - This integer value holds activity type id.
        Returns:
